interest.name: world wide web
interest.description: social media, web accessibility, and internet measurement

interest.name: knowledge diffusion
interest.description: explore how cutting-edge academic research diffuses into the industry and touches our daily lives

commands.what -u -do: i'm broadly interested in human-computer interaction and the web. recently, i'm studying knowledge diffusion in community q&a websites.
commands.what -u -into: after work, i unwind with spotify. i'm a huge fan of LE SSERAFIM, zeph, the 1975, and Charli XCX. after 6pm i'm either on hyrule or pelican town :/
commands.what -next: i'm continuing my research at the university of southern california (usc).
commands.get -cv: a (likely outdated) copy of my cv has been downloaded. Otherwise, please visit https://iamhuang.run/Run_Vita.pdf
commands.get -src: i built this website using react, material ui, framer motion, and d3.js. the source code can be accessed from https://github.com/itsrun/portfolio.
